Module com.teamsix.databasegui
Package com.teamsix.databasegui

Class RestockController

java.lang.Object
com.teamsix.databasegui.RestockController
public class RestockController extends Object
Controller for updating(+/-) the quantity for each menu item

  • Constructor Details

    • RestockController

      public RestockController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Gets every ingredient's name from the database, and populates a list view with the names. Gets every id and quantity with respect to the name from the database, and populates a list view with the ids and quantities. Populates the dropdown with ingredient names, and sets an action trigger for ingredientPick().

    • ingredientPick

      public void ingredientPick(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      Gets the ingredient that was picked from the dropdown. Sets a label's text to show which item is being restocked. Calls a function to get the current quantity of the item being restocked. Converts the quantity to a percentage(for the progress bar) and sets the progress bar's progress to that. Sets a label's text to the show the current quantity of the item being restocked.
      Parameters:
      Event - - ActionEvent triggered when an ingredient is picked from the dropdown.

    • OnRestock

      public void OnRestock()
      Restock or throws out the specified amount. Gets the entered text for increasing/decreasing quantity. Converts and stores the value of the increase amount to a double for the progress bar. Gets just item being restocked by getting the text from the above label. Queries the name to get its ID and stores it. Converts and stores the value of the increase amount to a integer to update quantity. Compares the entered increase amount and to see if positive or negatvive. If negative, update progressbar, change label text to show that quantity has been updated, and call function to increase quantity. Else, if positive, update progressbar, change label text to show that quantity has been updated, and call function to increase quantity.

    • onEditMenuClick

      protected void onEditMenuClick() throws IOException
      Changes scene when respective button is clicked(Edit Menu) by calling a function.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found.

    • onRestockPress

      protected void onRestockPress() throws IOException
      Changes scene when respective button is clicked(Restock) by calling a function.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found.

    • onProductUsageClick

      protected void onProductUsageClick() throws IOException
      Changes scene when respective button is clicked(Analyze Trends) by calling a function.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found.
